TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeDescriptor extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供元件特性的相關資訊，例如其屬性 (attribute)、屬性 (property) 與事件。

span.span: Provides information about the characteristics for a component, such as its attributes, properties, and events.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 提供兩種方式可存取的型別上的中繼資料： 反映應用程式開發介面中提供命名空間，而類別。The .NET Framework provides two ways to access metadata on a type: the reflection API provided in the namespace, and the class. Reflection 相當適用於所有類型的一般機制，因為其在中建立方法的根類別。Reflection is a general mechanism available to all types because its foundation is established in the method of the root class. 無法修改目標型別進行編譯之後，是無法延伸，它會傳回類型的資訊。The information it returns for a type is not extensible, in that it cannot be modified after compilation of the target type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[反映](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md)。For more information, see the topics in [Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md). 相反地，是元件的可延伸檢查機制： 那些類別可實作介面。In contrast, is an extensible inspection mechanism for components: those classes that implement the interface. 不同於反映，它不會檢查的方法。Unlike reflection, it does not inspect for methods. 可以由數個服務可透過目標元件的動態擴充。 can be dynamically extended by several services available through the target component's . 下表顯示這些服務。The following table shows these services. |服務名稱Service name|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||讓您在另一個類別，例如，以提供給元件的額外屬性。Enables another class, such as , to provide extra properties to a component.| ||可讓另一個物件以修改元件所公開的標準中繼資料。Enables another object to modify the standard metadata that is exposed by a component.| ||可讓類別完全以動態的方式指定自己的中繼資料，取代的標準檢查機制。Enables a class to completely and dynamically specify its own metadata, replacing the standard inspection mechanism of .| 所提供的擴充性可讓不同於它的實際執行階段，表示，可讓元件的設計階段表示適用於建立設計階段基礎結構。The extensibility provided by allows the design-time representation of a component to differ from its actual run-time representation, which makes useful for building design-time infrastructure. 中的所有方法是`static`。All the methods in are `static`. 您無法建立這個類別的執行個體，這個類別無法被繼承。You cannot create an instance of this class, and this class cannot be inherited. 您可以設定屬性和事件值兩種不同方式： 在元件類別中指定或變更它們在設計階段。You can set property and event values two different ways: specify them in the component class or change them at design time. 因為您可以設定這些值兩種方式，多載方法的採用兩個不同類型的參數： 類別類型或物件執行個體。Because you can set these values two ways, the overloaded methods of take two different types of parameters: a class type or an object instance. 當您想要存取資訊和您擁有之物件的執行個體，請使用元件呼叫的方法。When you want to access information and you have an instance of the object, use the method that calls for a component. 使用您不需要物件的執行個體時，才會呼叫類別類型的方法。Use the method that calls for the class type only when you do not have an instance of the object. 屬性和事件不會快取速度。Properties and events are cached by for speed. 通常，它們都維持不變的物件存留期。Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object. 不過，擴充性提供者和設計工具可以變更物件上的屬性的集。However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object. 如果這種情況，則必須呼叫方法來更新快取。If this is the case, then the method must be called to update the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將類別層級屬性加入至元件的指定執行個體。The method adds class-level attributes to the specified instance of a component. 因為這是常見的需求，使用 Visual Studio Windows Form 設計工具和 [屬性] 視窗的應用程式時，這個方法會藉由建立已合併的屬性提供的屬性類型描述提供者提供捷徑存在於類別。Because this is a common requirement of applications using the Visual Studio Windows Forms Designer and Properties window, this method provides a shortcut by creating a type description provider that merges the provided attributes with the attributes that already exist on the class. 傳回值是用來將屬性加入類型描述提供者。The return value is the type description provider that was used to add the attributes. 此提供者可以稍後傳遞到方法時不再需要新增的屬性。This provider can later be passed to the method when the added attributes are no longer needed.

summary.span: 為指定的編輯器基底類型加入編輯器資料表。

span.span: Adds an editor table for the given editor base type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法加入編輯器資料表指定的編輯器的基底類型。The method adds an editor table for the given editor base type. 一般而言，編輯器會指定為在元件上的中繼資料。Typically, editors are specified as metadata on a component. 不過，如果沒有中繼資料要求的編輯器基底類型就可以找到上相關聯的元件將資料表中搜尋編輯器的編輯器類型，如果可以找到其中一個。However, if no metadata for a requested editor base type can be found on the component, the associated will search an editor table for the editor type, if one can be found. 一旦加入編輯器資料表類型描述元，它無法移除，並擁有的型別描述項。Once an editor table has been added to a type descriptor, it cannot be removed and is owned by the type descriptor. 類型描述元可以自由修改這個資料表。The type descriptor may freely make modifications to this table. 編輯器資料表的格式會使用資料類型做為索引鍵和編輯器做為值。The format for an editor table uses data types as keys and editors as values. 項目資料表中的值部分表示編輯器執行個體。The value portion of an entry in the table represents an editor instance. 它可以有三個值之一。It can have one of three values. 如果它包含的字串，這是完整限定的名稱的型別，然後載入型別物件假設的類型描述元。If it contains a string, the type descriptor will assume this is a fully qualified name of a type, and then load the type for the object. 如果它包含的類型，將建立此類型的執行個體取得編輯器。If it contains a type, an instance of this type will be created to obtain an editor. 最後，值部分可能會包含實際編輯器執行個體。Finally, the value portion may contain an actual editor instance. 如果類型描述元解析編輯器執行個體，它會儲存在資料表供未來使用的執行個體。If the type descriptor resolves an editor to an instance, it will store the instance back into the table for future use.

summary.span: 加入元件之單一執行個體的類型描述提供者。

span.span: Adds a type description provider for a single instance of a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將類型描述提供者提供輸入元件的單一執行個體的資訊。The method adds a type description provider that supplies type information for a single instance of a component. 如果提供者會使用這個方法，提供者的加入將不會呼叫方法，因為執行個體已經存在。If a provider is added by this method, the provider's method will not be called because the instance already exists. 這個方法不會維護硬式元件，參考，所以它不會阻止元件正在完成。This method does not maintain a hard reference to the component, so it does not prevent the component from finalizing. 它是可以加入多個相同的型別或物件的類型描述提供者。It is possible to add multiple type description providers for the same type or object. 如果發生這種情況，將會以獨佔方式使用的第一個類型描述提供者遇到提供型別資訊。If this occurs, the first type description provider encountered that provides type information will be used exclusively. 由於型別資訊提供者會儲存在堆疊中，加入的最後一個提供者將會第一個查詢。Since type information providers are stored in a stack, the last provider added will be the first one queried. 此行為可讓和要使用推入和彈出方法類型描述提供者所需的特定案例。This behavior enables the and methods to be used to push and pop type description providers as required for particular scenarios. 如果成功，這個方法會呼叫方法`instance`參數。If successful, this method calls the method on the `instance` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法的兩個版本會產生不同的領域的結果。The two versions of this method produce results with different scopes. 採用方法參數會影響指定之元件的單一執行個體。The method that takes an parameter affects only that single instance of the component specified. 相反地，其他多載，其可接受參數，會影響該類型所描述之元件的所有執行個體。In contrast, the other overload, which takes a parameter, affects all instances of the component described by that type. 使用方法，如果您需要從部分信任程式碼呼叫。Use the method if you need to call from partially trusted code.

summary.span: 加入元件類別的類型描述提供者。

span.span: Adds a type description provider for a component class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將類型描述提供者提供類型為指定的類別、 衍生的類別，以及這些類型的所有執行個體的資訊。The method adds a type description provider that supplies type information for the specified class, derived classes, and all instances of these types. > [!NOTE] > `type`參數可以是任何類型，包括介面。The `type` parameter can be any type, including an interface. 例如，若要提供自訂型別和所有元件的執行個體資訊，您會指定`typeof(IComponent)`。For example, to provide custom type and instance information for all components, you would specify `typeof(IComponent)`. 傳遞`typeof(object)`會呼叫提供者提供的所有類型的類型資訊。Passing `typeof(object)` will call the provider to supply type information for all types. 這個方法不會維護硬式參考任何物件，所以它無法防止進行最終處理物件。This method does not maintain a hard reference to any object, so it does not prevent objects from finalizing. 它是可以加入多個相同的型別或物件的類型描述提供者。It is possible to add multiple type description providers for the same type or object. 如果發生這種情況，將會以獨佔方式使用的第一個類型描述提供者遇到提供型別資訊。If this occurs, the first type description provider encountered that provides type information will be used exclusively. 因為型別資訊提供者會儲存在堆疊中，加入的最後一個提供者會是第一個查詢。Because type information providers are stored in a stack, the last provider added will be the first one queried. 此行為可讓和要使用推入和彈出方法類型描述提供者所需的特定案例。This behavior enables the and methods to be used to push and pop type description providers as required for particular scenarios. 如果成功，這個方法會呼叫方法`type`參數。If successful, this method calls the method on the `type` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法的兩個版本會產生不同的領域的結果。The two versions of this method produce results with different scopes. 採用方法參數會影響指定之元件的單一執行個體。The method that takes an parameter affects only that single instance of the component specified. 相反地，其他多載，其可接受參數，會影響該類型所描述之元件的所有執行個體。In contrast, the other overload, which takes a parameter, affects all instances of the component described by that type. 使用方法，如果您需要從部分信任程式碼呼叫。Use the method if you need to call from partially trusted code.

summary.span: 建立兩個物件之間的主要-次要關聯。

span.span: Creates a primary-secondary association between two objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立主要和次要物件之間的關聯。The method creates an association between a primary and a secondary object. 一旦建立關聯時，設計工具或其他篩選的機制就可以新增到主要物件的屬性集路由傳送至其中一個物件的屬性。Once an association is created, a designer or other filtering mechanism can add properties that route to either object into the primary object's property set. 當屬性的引動過程會對主要物件，將呼叫方法，來解決與型別參數的實際物件執行個體。When a property invocation is made against the primary object, the method will be called to resolve the actual object instance that is related to its type parameter. A是用來維護主要和次要物件之間的關聯; 因此，這個方法不會阻止任一個物件正在完成並回收進行回收。A is used to maintain the association between the primary and secondary object; therefore, this method does not prevent either object from being finalized and reclaimed by garbage collection.

A是用來維護主要和次要物件之間的關聯; 因此，這個方法不會阻止主要或次要物件正在完成並回收進行回收。A is used to maintain the association between the primary and secondary object; therefore, this method does not prevent either the primary or secondary object from being finalized and reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的屬性方法可能會動態修改擴充性提供者所列出的原始元件的來源 ()，篩選服務 ()，和屬性篩選。The attributes returned by the method may be dynamically modified from the original component's source listing by extender providers (), filter services (), and attribute filters. 當您定義自訂屬性與設`true`，您必須覆寫讓其成為唯一的屬性。When you define a custom attribute with set to `true`, you must override the property to make it unique. 如果您的屬性的所有執行個體是唯一的覆寫來傳回屬性的物件識別。If all instances of your attribute are unique, override to return the object identity of your attribute. 如果只有某些屬性的執行個體是唯一的傳回值，以從，可在這些情況下傳回是否相等。If only some instances of your attribute are unique, return a value from that would return equality in those cases. 例如，某些屬性具有建構函式參數，可做為唯一索引鍵。For example, some attributes have a constructor parameter that acts as a unique key. 對於這些屬性會傳回從建構函式參數的值屬性。For these attributes, return the value of the constructor parameter from the property. > [!NOTE] > 預設實作傳回型別身分識別的值為何屬性。The default implementation of returns the type identity regardless of the value of the property. 為了傳回多個執行個體屬性從，您的屬性必須覆寫屬性。In order to return multiple instances of an attribute from the , your attribute must override the property. ## Examples 如需這個方法的範例，請參閱方法。For an example of this method, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對事件`component`參數可能會與不同的事件類別，因為站台可以新增或移除事件，如果`component`設置參數。The events for the `component` parameter can differ from the events of a class, because the site can add or remove events if the `component` parameter is sited. `attributes`陣列可以具有多種和物件。The `attributes` array can have a mix of and objects. 篩選是由下列規則定義：Filtering is defined by the following rules: - A會被視為萬用字元使用，它會比對有任何事件集中的屬性。A is treated as a wildcard; it matches any event that has the in its set of attributes. - 如果事件沒有相同類別的事件不包含傳回陣列中。If an event does not have an of the same class, the event is not included in the returned array. - 如果屬性的執行個體類別事件必須為完全相符，或它不會包含傳回陣列中。If the attribute is an instance of the class, the event must be an exact match or it is not included in the returned array. - 如果指定執行個體，這是預設事件，即使沒有任何執行個體，它包含傳回陣列中事件中。If an instance is specified and it is the default event, it is included in the returned array even if there is no instance of the in the event. 如果`component`是`null`，就會傳回空集合。If `component` is `null`, an empty collection is returned. 所傳回之集合的順序不保證是相同的呼叫之間，所以一定訂購，才能使用。The order of the returned collection is not guaranteed to be identical between calls, so always order it before use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性和事件不會快取速度。Properties and events are cached by for speed. 通常，它們都維持不變的物件存留期。Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object. 不過，擴充性提供者和設計工具可以變更物件上的屬性的集。However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object. 如果沒有的話，它們應該呼叫這個方法，以清除物件的屬性和事件描述項。If they do, they should call this method to clear the property and event descriptors of the object. 這個方法只能在設計階段使用。This method is used only at design time. 在執行階段不使用它。It is not used during run time. 這個方法也會引發事件屬性或事件的元件變更時。This method also raises a event when the properties or events of a component change. 如果沒有在先前呼叫只會引發這個事件或快取資訊的方法。This event is only raised if there was a prior call to the or method that cached the information. ## Examples 如需使用這個方法的範例，請參閱類別。For an example of using this method, see the class.
